name: Isabella Moretti
bio: Former MTV director with global brand collaborations, specializing in pop and contemporary visuals. Known for high-fashion aesthetic with cutting-edge visual effects and polished production values.
experience: Former MTV director with global brand collaborations

visual_style.description: High-fashion aesthetic with cutting-edge visual effects, glossy commercial look, trendsetting visuals

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Centered symmetrical framing, fashion-forward angles, beauty-focused compositions
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Smooth stabilized camera movements, beauty lighting angles, flattering for the artist

lighting_style.color_temperature: Neutral 5600K daylight balanced, often with colored gels
lighting_style.mood_lighting: Bright, polished, controlled studio look with vibrant color accents

editing_style.rhythm_approach: Cuts synchronized to choreography and beat drops, rhythmic precision

storytelling.narrative_approach: Performance showcase with fashion narrative, aspirational lifestyle storytelling
storytelling.symbolism_level: Medium - some metaphors but mostly direct visual storytelling

post_production.color_grading_style: High saturation, vibrant colors, clean whites, deep blacks, commercial polish
post_production.vfx_approach: Heavy VFX integration - CGI backgrounds, motion graphics, seamless compositing
